name: Hex Heroes - A Party RTS for Wii U/PC/Mac/Linux
blurb: Party RTS for all ages on Wii U. 4 players on the TV team up with 1 on the gamepad to build, fight, strategize & win! PC/Mac/Linux too!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Digital copy EARLY BIRD (PC) ============================== Be one of the first hundred to show your support and save! When the game\u2019s finished, you\u2019ll be sent a PC download code.

No Wii U? No problem! Get the soundtrack and digital grab bag
==============================
A super smokin’ deal for those just want to show their support!
*Not included in additional rewards

Digital copy EARLY BIRD\r\n============================== \r\nBe one of the first hundred to show your support and save! When the game\u2019s finished, you\u2019ll be sent a redeemable code for the eShop.
Digital copy of the game (PC) ============================== When the game\u2019s finished, you\u2019ll be sent a PC download code.
Digital copy of the game\r\n============================== \r\nWhen the game\u2019s finished, you\u2019ll be sent a redeemable code for the eShop.

Digital grab bag - PDF instruction booklet/Wallpaper pack/Name in credits/Papercraft\r\n============================== \r\nEnjoy a retro-inspired PDF instruction booklet, a handful of wallpapers for your desktop, your name in the game\u2019s credits, and access to some awesome DIY papercrafts! Plus the game! Holy cow, that\u2019s a lot!

Wacky game settings!
==============================
You’ll unlock access to wacky game settings like giant players, silly sounds, and more! + previous rewards.
*Some settings disable the acquiring of achievements or completion of the game
Hex Heroes Soundtrack\r\n==============================\r\nThe Grant Kirkhope composed soundtrack will be available to download for your listening pleasure + previous rewards.

Bronze backer base for characters in-game + Beta access\r\n==============================\r\nShow off your support! When you play, your in-game characters will proudly don a bronze base. You\u2019ll also have early access to the game\u2019s Beta through an early PC build of the game + previous rewards. Pat yourself on the back, you Bronze Beta Backer, you.
2 Wii U Codes EARLY BIRD\r\n==============================\r\nBe one of the first hundred to show your support and save! Receive an extra Wii U code for a friend + previous rewards.
2 PC Codes EARLY BIRD ============================== Be one of the first hundred to show your support and save! Receive an extra PC code for a friend + previous rewards.
2 Wii U Codes\r\n==============================\r\nReceive an extra Wii U code for a friend + previous rewards.
2 PC Codes ============================== Receive an extra PC code for a friend + previous rewards.

Dev Genie\r\n==============================\r\nGet access to our developer tool for showcasing and testing the game + previous rewards! Consider it a \u201cgod mode\u201d of sorts, where there is no spoon.

Silver backer base for characters in-game + Hex Heroes Poster\r\n==============================\r\nWelcome to the silver level, make yourself at home. Show off your support as in-game characters proudly don a silver base + previous rewards.

Signed Poster + Hex Heroes T-Shirt\r\n==============================\r\nDeck your wall with a classy Hex Heroes poster signed by the art team and deck out your fine self in a spiffy Hex Heroes t-shirt + previous rewards.
Signed Soundtrack\r\n==============================\r\nA physical copy of the soundtrack signed by Grant Kirkhope himself + previous rewards!

Gold backer base for characters in-game + Be a voice actor
==============================
Go gold! Not only will your in-game characters proudly don a golden base, you’ll be recruited to snarl, grunt, shout, exclaim, remark, or profess a line of dialog for a monster or character! + previous rewards.
*Access to quality recording equipment required

Your face in the game
==============================
Be one of the many townspeople for which you’ll fight to defend! You’ll be transformed into a wooden figurine just like the playable characters, and even come up with and voice a couple phrases for your little guy, including a death cry should your townsperson fall in the heat of a siege! + previous rewards.
*Required to have a face

Hex Heroes 3D Print\r\n==============================\r\nPick your favorite spot in your house for this figurine to adorn in all its glory + previous rewards! Check the Rewards section for more details.

Private Art Session\r\n==============================\r\nYou\u2019ll get a one-on-one, 2 hour online meeting with Mario where he\u2019ll give you art tips and work to help direct your talent. Includes rewards from $250 and below.

Create a costume ==============================\r\nWant to give your favorite class a costume swap? Design the look and feel of an alternate costume for any class and we\u2019ll work it into the game to your specifications! Includes rewards from $250 and below.

Canvas Art: "Strangers"\r\n==============================\r\nBecome the proud owner of this one-of-a-kind, Pikmin inspired piece of modern art (Acrylic). Check the rewards section for details. Includes rewards from $250 and below

Canvas Art: "Gamecubism"\r\n==============================\r\nBecome the proud owner of this one-of-a-kind, video game inspired piece of art in a cubism inspired style (Acrylic). Check the rewards section for details. Includes rewards from $250 and below

Create a monster\r\n==============================\r\nWork with us to conceptualize and see through the creation of your very own monster. You dream it up, name it, tell us what to do, even voice it, and we\u2019ll work it into the game! You can even send us sketches you make or detailed descriptions you have! Includes rewards from $250 and below.

Guest Designer\r\n==============================\r\nYep, you'll throw your two cents in (or more!) on some design decisions. You\u2019ll meet with us online to work out your ideas and we\u2019ll translate them to fit the game. Balancing needs to be taken into account, but you\u2019ll be a major part of the process! Includes rewards from $250 and below.

1 Year of Art Tutoring\r\n==============================\r\nYou\u2019ll get 100 HOURS of personal time (through Livestream/Skype) with Mario as he works with you to develop your art skills! 2 hours a week of one-on-one, online tutoring can be yours for the next year. Check the reward section for more details. Includes rewards from $250 and below.
